name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: merge files to pdf - with PDFzorro

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: merge files online to one pdf, direct from GoogleDrive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
App for Google Drive to merge different files to one single PDF-document. 
This app integrates into the Google DriveÂ´s context menu. It is easy and fast to handle.

Simple mark the files you want to merge, right click and select "merge files to pdf - with PDFzorro"

For example:

[mark files online in your Google Drive]
News.pdf
Letter.docx
Timetable.xls
Lunch.gdoc

[rightclick and merge to new file]
merge_file.pdf
